overview: We Are Reckless intimately documents the bittersweet final month of the last family-owned video store in Seattle, Reckless Video. Through poignant interviews with the former owner, employees, and loyal customers, the documentary captures the deep love and appreciation for the store, physical media, and the vibrant sense of community it fostered.
tagline: THE LAST DAYS OF RECKLESS VIDEO
title: We Are Reckless
